PartesCancion.Texto:
durante el tema hay una guitarra ritmica de reggae que
aparece y desaparece que hace siempre Bm. Es un tema aburrido
para tocar y cantarlo uno solo con la guitarra,pero esta muy
bueno para practicar solos arriba del disco.

Bm
You've got those old blue jeans baby

God save me
You've got those blue jeans baby
I mean,I mean, I mean, God save me

There's no more light in the sky, oh !
There's no more sun
There's no more moon
There's no more sea in the sea, oh !
And you know I'll find it soon

Those blue jeans got me down
Those blue jeans got me down

Hey !, what happened there , man ?
I dont know
They got me down
See the look in your eyes
Those jeans got me and you down

Everything is good
Everything is wrong
Everything is understood
Everything is gone

Those blue jeans got the best in
Those blue jeans got the best out of me
